title: SkyZone Trampoline Fun with FlipSide
desc: Join Flipside for a jumping fun time at Sky Zone Trampoline Park. We will Uber to Sky Zone for two hours of action. The cost is only $15 and includes two hours of trampolining and transportation. Space is limited, so sign up soon and please remember to pay in advance to secure your spot!
more: Saturday, March 30; 7:45 p.m. leave from the Main Circle
